mapper.update: update pms_product_operate_log set product_id = #{productId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, price_old = #{priceOld,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, price_new = #{priceNew,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, sale_price_old = #{salePriceOld,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, sale_price_new = #{salePriceNew,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, gift_point_old = #{giftPointOld,jdbcType=INTEGER}, gift_point_new = #{giftPointNew,jdbcType=INTEGER}, use_point_limit_old = #{usePointLimitOld,jdbcType=INTEGER}, use_point_limit_new = #{usePointLimitNew,jdbcType=INTEGER}, operate_man = #{operateMan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, product_id, price_old, price_new, sale_price_old, sale_price_new, gift_point_old, gift_point_new, use_point_limit_old, use_point_limit_new, operate_man, create_time from pms_product_operate_log where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select id, product_id, price_old, price_new, sale_price_old, sale_price_new, gift_point_old, gift_point_new, use_point_limit_old, use_point_limit_new, operate_man, create_time from pms_product_operate_log
